other_tests.findings: The MRCP showed cholelithiasis and mild pericholecystic free fluid. There is a 13 mm calculus in the cystic duct, which is dilated measuring up to 15 mm, and no choledocholithiasis. The liver has a 10 x 10 mm non-enhancing hyperintense focus in segment 2, likely a small cyst or biliary hamartoma.
